body.name: BODUM Pour Over Coffee Maker with Permanent Filter, New Cork, 34 OZ
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 36 mins
features: Pour Over Coffee: Manual Pour Over Coffee Maker allows you to brew an excellent cup of Coffee in minutes
Stainless steel: Includes a new and improved permanent, stainless steel mesh filter that helps extract your coffee's aromatic oils and subtle flavors instead of being absorbed by a paper filter
Coffee Carafe: Made of durable, heat-resistant borosilicate glass with Cork Band detailing that is both functional and elegant; single wall
Quick and Easy: Simply add coarse ground Coffee to filter, pour a small amount of water in a circular motion over ground Coffee until soaked then add the remaining water and let drip
Servings: Pour Over Coffee Maker makes 8 cups of Coffee, 4 oz each; dishwasher safe
body.description: The pour over promises an excellent, rich taste and robust aroma while maintaining the natural oils of the ground Coffee. For the perfect cup of Coffee, simply fill the cone-shaped filter with freshly ground Coffee and pour a small amount of heated water over them until soaked. Slowly pour the remaining hot water into the filter. Coffee will drip into the mouth-blown, borosilicate glass carafe and, in 3-4 minutes, will be ready to serve. Remove the filter from the carafe before serving and enjoy! Materials - s/s, plastic,silicone. Use & Care: Wash in warm, soapy water before first use and dry thoroughly. The glass carafe and stainless steel filter are dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my coffee game with this thing, and I am thoroughly impressed. This sleek and well-designed coffee maker has become an integral part of my morning routine, delivering a cup of coffee that's nothing short of perfection.The craftsmanship of this pour over coffee maker is outstanding. The high-quality borosilicate glass carafe not only looks elegant on my countertop but also ensures that the brewing process maintains the coffee's rich flavors without any unwanted residue or aftertaste. The stainless steel filter is a game-changer, allowing the natural oils and subtle notes of the coffee to shine through, creating a truly aromatic and flavorful cup.What sets this pour over coffee maker apart is its user-friendly design. The wide mouth of the carafe makes pouring water and adding coffee grounds a breeze. The precise spout ensures a controlled and even pour, allowing me to take charge of the brewing process and customize the strength of my coffee to perfection. The capacity is just right for a single cup or a few servings, making it ideal for both solo mornings and entertaining guests.Cleanup is a snap too. The stainless steel filter is easy to disassemble and clean, and the borosilicate glass is dishwasher safe for added convenience. I appreciate the durability of the materials used, and the overall construction feels robust and built to last.This pour over coffee maker has truly elevated my coffee-drinking experience. The resulting brew is consistently smooth, bold, and full of nuanced flavors. If you're a coffee enthusiast or just looking to enhance your morning ritual, the [Brand Name] Pour Over Coffee Maker is a fantastic investment. It combines style, functionality, and exceptional brewing capabilities, making it a standout choice in the world of coffee makers. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what it should be
reviews.reviewText: It is what it is. An elegantly simple, zero waste coffee solution. I think it’s pretty enough to not mind it sitting out on the counter. Works well, easy to clean.Great choice for simple pour-over brewing. I’m not particularly fussy about coffee. Took me two or three attempts to dial in a cup I enjoy quite well. I’m pouring kettle-boiled water over a standard grocery store grind with the reusable filter that came with the set, and the last sip of coffee does have some sediment. I make a little more than I want and don’t take the last of the pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pour Over
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Title: Eco-Friendly Pour Over Coffee Maker ReviewRating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️I recently switched to an eco-friendly coffee maker and tested it today. Here's my honest review:Material: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The coffee maker is made of good quality material, and the glass is not fragile.Quality: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The overall quality of the coffee maker is excellent.Ease of Cleaning: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The heat pad in the middle of the coffee maker cannot be machine washed, but the rest is dishwasher safe. Cleaning the filter is easy; just dump it in the trash, rinse, and put it in the dishwasher.Ease of Use: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The coffee maker is very easy to use.Filter: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️The filter performs well, although some coffee may still end up in the container. I would rate it 4.5 stars out of 5. No filters for pour overs would be a 5 without paper filter liner in my opinion.Durability: N/ASince I just bought it, I cannot comment on its long-term durability.Note: This review is NOT sponsored. I made the switch for eco-friendly reasons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good looking on the counter, makes a consistently good cup of coffee, and somewhat easy to clean up. What more can you ask for??The good:- Quick and easy use- Design looks great on the counterThe bad:- The funnel can only take about 8 ounces at a time. This mean you have a wait a little in between pours if you are making more an one cup- Cleaning can be a pain because the cork handle should be removed.Pro tips:- This goes on sale ($5 off) every 90 days or so. If you’re not in a hurry and want to save a few bucks, place in your cart and watch. It’s like clockwork.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this! It works just the way it should and of course the esthetics of it are super pleasing and add to the coffee vibe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the effort
reviews.reviewText: There is a lot of effort to making coffee with this maker. You have to pour the hot water over the coffee grounds and wait for the water to pass through. All of the water will not fit in the filter, If you are making a full pot, you will have to pour water in a few times and wait for each pour to pass through before adding more. The pot is also difficult to clean well if you do not have a bottle brush.I had one before and the flask was broken. The old one had a nylon/plastic filter. When I ordered the new one, it has a metal filter. This new, metal filter takes longer to filter the water than the old plastic one. Also requires you to give it a stir in order for it to all go through.After all that, I like the way the coffee comes out. It is the only way I make coffee at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: I would honestly keep buying this over and over again. I use mine every morning. I’ve even bought my mother in law one who was never really into brewing coffee just using the instant. Now she uses hers everyday as well. It’s great quality and easy to use. Plus side it’s even easier to clean unlike regular coffee machines!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this coffee maker.
reviews.reviewText: It has an all glass decanter and a really nice, very functional stainless steel permanent filter. The design allows me to make drip coffee with no muss. I don’t need more than three cups of coffee per day so this works beautifully. Simple, effective, easy to use.
Me encantó, es fácil preparar un excelente café, además ecológica, no hay que deshechar nada.
